players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Alice was the one who was found dead last night. Let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other."
You: "Let's not jump to conclusions. It's only the first day, and we need more information to make a rational decision."
You: "Let's focus on gathering more information before making any hasty decisions. We want to ensure we don't mistakenly arrest an innocent person."

Diana: "I think it's important that we all share any information we might have, no matter how insignificant it may seem. We need to work together to solve this mystery and ensure the safety of our village."
